response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and potential impact on your endeavors, we believe it's worth every penny. Considering its true worth, we propose a fair price of $950,000 for this exceptional item. We understand that this might be a significant investment, but we assure you that it will bring substantial returns and benefits to you. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
